scenes.title: Landing on the Alien Planet
scenes.description: Jane and Carl land on an alien planet and discover a mysterious golden egg.

shots.composition: Full view of the Time Travel Craft and surrounding alien terrain
shots.action: Time Travel Craft landing on the alien planet
shots.lighting: Artificial lighting from the craft and ambient lighting from alien planet
shots.scriptSegment: The TIME TRAVEL CRAFT, a sleek vessel radiating luminous blue lights, softly lands on the gritty, gold-hued terrain.

shots.composition: Jane and Carl exiting from the craft
shots.action: Jane and Carl step onto the alien soil
shots.scriptSegment: The hatch opens, revealing our TIME TRAVELLERS, COMMANDER JANE and LIEUTENANT CARL. The two, encased in high-tech suits, carefully step onto the alien soil, gazing in awe at gigantic alien plants swaying in the eerie winds.

shots.composition: Focus on Jane and Carl's faces
shots.scriptSegment:
COMMANDER JANE 
(swallowing hard)
So far, so historical.

LIEUTENANT CARL 
(faces Jane, grinning)
Commander, you really need to work on your one-liners.

dialogue.speaker: Lieutenant Carl
dialogue.text: Commander, you really need to work on your one-liners.

shots.composition: Focus on the golden egg in the plant's leaf
shots.action: Carl moves towards the golden egg
shots.lighting: Natural ambient lighting from the alien planet
shots.scriptSegment: Suddenly, they spot a gleaming object nestled in a plant's curled leaf - a golden egg, roughly the size of a human head. Carl rushes forward, enchantment replacing his cavalier demeanor.

shots.composition: Focus on Carl picking up the egg
shots.lighting: Natural lighting from the glowing egg
shots.scriptSegment:
LIEUTENANT CARL 
(slowly picks the 'egg')
It's... it's warm, Commander. Suddenly, the egg vibrates, emitting a low, pulsating hum. It illuminates, casting an ethereal glow on their faces.

shots.composition: Full view of Carl, Jane, and the glowing egg
shots.action: Holographic message appears from the egg
shots.effects: Holographic symbols float from the egg
shots.lighting: Artificial lighting from the glowing egg
shots.scriptSegment: Astonishing symbols float from the egg, creating a swirling holographic message in a cryptic, alien language.

shots.composition: Focus on Jane and Carl's faces
shots.action: Jane and Carl exchange a glance
shots.lighting: Artificial lighting from the glowing egg
shots.scriptSegment: Carl and Jane exchange a startled glance.
